column1: Comma in error msg is substituted with ^ symbol
For separating arguments in error args | symbol is used

column3: Syntax error on token "*"^ Expression expected after this token

column4: Syntax error on token "^"^ delete this token

column3: Syntax error on token "stroke"^ = expected after this token
Syntax error^ insert ")" to complete Expression
Syntax error^ insert ")" to complete MethodInvocation
Syntax error^ insert ";" to complete Statement
